transcript:
Jane Smith: Hi Robert, it's Jane from InfiniMeld. How are you doing today?

Robert Parker: Hi Jane, I'm okay. How about you?

Jane Smith: I'm good, thanks. So, um, I think we need to talk about the proposal? 

Robert Parker: Right, right. The proposal. 

Jane Smith: You mentioned that you wanted a revised version... correct?

Robert Parker: Yeah, we had some points we needed you to address. Did you...uh, get my email?

Jane Smith: Um, I think so... let me check. Hold on.

Robert Parker: Sure...

Jane Smith: Okay, I found it. So, you wanted changes in, like, the pricing or something?

Robert Parker: Not exactly. We had specific concerns about the integration part of the project.

Jane Smith: Oh, right. Integration. Do you have, like, specifics?

Robert Parker: Yeah, I outlined them in the email. I think there were points about the API compatibility and data migration.

Jane Smith: Okay, I see... So, you need more details on, um, API and migration... Got it.

Robert Parker: Yeah, and maybe a bit more clarity on the timeline as well.

Jane Smith: Alright. Timeline... API... Migration... Anything else?

Robert Parker: Well, those are the main points. But we also wanted to discuss support options.

Jane Smith: Support options, sure. 

Robert Parker: So, what can you revise exactly?

Jane Smith: Uh, I'll have to check with my team on that. But, um, we can definitely work on those concerns.

Robert Parker: Okay, when can you get back to us with the revised proposal?

Jane Smith: Um, I'll have to see. Maybe by the end of the week?

Robert Parker: End of the week? Hmm... Anything faster?

Jane Smith: Uh, I'll try, but no promises...

Robert Parker: Alright, I guess. Just prioritize the integration part, okay?

Jane Smith: Yep, sure. Integration first. Got it.

Robert Parker: Okay, good. And the costs, too. We want to make sure there are no hidden fees.

Jane Smith: Right. No hidden fees. Uh, clear pricing.

Robert Parker: Yes.

Jane Smith: So is there anything else, or should we...?

Robert Parker: Just make sure you read through the entire email again, okay?

Jane Smith: Okay, sure. I'll read it.

Robert Parker: Alright. And you'll get back to us by?

Jane Smith: Well, I'll say end of the week but I'll try for sooner.

Robert Parker: Okay. I'll look out for it.

Jane Smith: Alright. Thanks, Robert.

Robert Parker: Yep. Bye.

Jane Smith: Bye.
